author: tex73110
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | Mis selecciones para las finales de cuartos.
body:
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)
# [The @blocktrades World Cup | Mis selecciones para las finales de cuartos.]( https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | Uruguay | vs | France | 1 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Sweden | vs | England |2 2 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1 REGLAS 1 - El título de tu publicación debe ser: The @blocktrades World Cup | Mis selecciones para las finales de cuartos. 2 - En su publicación, debe incluir un enlace a este anuncio. 3 - Utiliza el formato incluido en esta publicación para hacer tus predicciones para que podamos organizar cada entrada. 4 - Usa las etiquetas "blocktradesworldcup" y la etiqueta "mypicks". 5 - Resteem esta publicación. Necesitamos que todos vean esta publicación para que nadie se quede atrás. 6 - No puedes editar tu publicación después del primer partido de este inicio de etapa. 7 - Reputación mínima para participar es 40. Esto es para evitar que los bots se unan y vamos a verificar que los ganadores SON ACTIVOS Y REALES. 8 - Puede enviar su entrada hasta el 4 de julio de 2018 a las 16:59 p.m., hora universal UTC + 3. Si no conoce esa zona horaria, [verifíquela aquí]( https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/russia/moscow) Debes incluir el puntaje para estas predicciones. Por cada puntaje correcto obtendrás tres (3) puntos. Si solo acertaste quién ganó pero no obtuviste el puntaje correcto, obtendrás un (1) punto. * Si no te uniste a la etapa de grupos y etapa eliminatoria, NO PUEDES UNIRTE A ESTA RONDA.
***

author: cryptobols
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
These are my quarter finals picks in the @blocktrades World Cup Competition!!!

The knockout stage has been amazing so far and I only expect it to continue!

France has looked amazing and I expect them to prevail.  I bet Brazil vs Belgium will be a barn burner that goes to extra time.

The other side of the bracket is a bit more of a toss-up for me.  I'm betting on Russia because it is a home game for them.  I expect the Sweden-England game will be another tight one that goes to extra time.

What does everyone else think?

-|-|-|-|-

1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 0

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
Hey everyone! What a rare world cup has been given until now. Again, I made only half the results, 50% accurate, and Sweden was my only hero hitting the score that I predicted.

But it really does not matter, because this cup has proven to be unpredictable and absolutely all the results can be given. Countries like Croatia, Russia or Sweden have real chances of qualifying to the final, and countries like Belgium can win their first cup, certainly by now it would not be surprising.

But let's go at once to the predictions, without forgetting to thank @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul for this contest.

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
>The last 16 stage finished a few minutes ago and we already know the matches for the round of Quarter finals

> As you already know, @blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.
We have more than 1,800 valid entries and the competition is very close, no one is far ahead and everyone can still win, especially considering that for the knockout stage we will consider the correct score so people can earn more points per match.

> To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 4 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 4 games in Regual time (only the first 90 minutes):
Uruguay vs France

# "Cuanto más difícil es la victoria, mayor es la felicidad de ganar" ### Pelé ![world-cup-russia-2018-png-clip-art-5a1d4792b7fe38.4264519315118683067536.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRVy7aBuNdqsMHEcNVZKp7zdcXwxBibXTJfAvBgYhw5fm/world-cup-russia-2018-png-clip-art-5a1d4792b7fe38.4264519315118683067536.jpg) [Source](https://www.kisspng.com/png-world-cup-russia-2018-png-clip-art-9360/)
#
# Hola a todos! Un placer saludarles nuevamente. Hace pocas horas finalizó la Fase de Octavos de Final del Mundial de Fútbol Rusia 2018, y en esta ocasión quiero compartir con todos, mis predicciones para los Cuartos de Final del máximo certamen universal del llamado Deporte Rey. Los organizadores del evento son @anomadosoul y @acidyo y el patrocinador es @blocktrades. Para participar dirígete al post original del concurso haciendo clic aquí [Click >](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) # ![separador steemitvzla.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZKRcR4aqH96zELf3SjrP5FrWiSiM9RyK3dbR5Lt9ycJC/separador%20steemitvzla.jpg) Hello everyone! A pleasure to greet you again. A few hours ago, the Round of 16 of the FIFA World Cup Russia 2018 ended, and this time I want to share with all you, my predictions for the Quarter Finals Stage of the maximum universal contest of the so called King of the Sports. The organizers of the event are @anomadosoul and @acidyo and the sponsor is @blocktrades. To participate, go to the original post of the contest by clicking here [Click >](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
#
![barravzla.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRma5ScwrX8eLgYpoiW6f9Bn7pX3Q43F6hnPvJgro3m9b/barravzla.jpg)
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 1 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 0 | Sweden | vs | England |2 1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2
#
![barravzla.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRma5ScwrX8eLgYpoiW6f9Bn7pX3Q43F6hnPvJgro3m9b/barravzla.jpg)
#
Los invito a visitar mis mas recientes publicaciones haciendo **click** en los siguientes enlaces: + [#cityscapephotography: A lonely street](https://steemit.com/cityscapephotography/@manuelgil64/cityscapephotography-a-lonely-street) + [#landscapephotography: Twilight over Barquisimeto](https://steemit.com/landscapephotography/@manuelgil64/landscapephotography-twilight-over-barquisimeto) + [ColorChallenge: SundayPurple - Hojas del Jardín](https://steemit.com/colorchallenge/@manuelgil64/colorchallenge-sundaypurple-hojas-del-jardin) + ["Donde el Pasado y el Presente se confunden"](https://steemit.com/smartphonephotography/@manuelgil64/donde-el-pasado-y-el-presente-se-confunden) + [JFK: Un Visionario Americano](https://steemit.com/cervantes/@manuelgil64/jfk-un-visionario-americano) + [ColorChallenge: MondayRed - Mírame](https://steemit.com/colorchallenge/@manuelgil64/colorchallenge-mondayred-mirame)

author: mediahousent
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for Quarter Finals
body:
![football-3024154__480.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdJ9sPdLMQfWRfKRt26rmV7p8BQ3FBefXhQh8YkbDuYQH/football-3024154__480.jpg)
[Source](https://pixabay.com/en/football-shoe-football-boot-sport-3024154/)

I guess the opportunity to win some great prizes in the ongoing prediction organized by @anomadsoul & @acidyo and sponsored by @blocktrades is still much open to me. The long awaited World Cup Russia 2018 started few weeks ago and the group stage as well as the Round of 16 are over. 
It has been a great moment so far, hot, hilarious and sensational games from the team/nations.
Even it was an unbelievable moment for the defending champ to be evicted from the race so soon. **Guess nobody saw that coming!**

Some defeats are just too mysterious and unbelievable, but it is football. Anything can happen! 
Although, my nation was defeated but we had a better game so far in the history of World Cup. I'm looking forward to a better competition next four years, hopefully the squad would have gain much international experience.

**Before the World Cup started, I was privileged to join a football prediction organized by @anomadsoul and @acidyo on the blockchain for a whooping sum of 2,000 STEEM BACK DOLLARS. Isn't that fantastic? 
This prediction is sponsored by @blocktrades 
[Perhaps, you want dive into the pool like me. Catch your swimming trunks here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)**

![steemflourish.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYuwE59nBtKjnPUhd9x3XoLkVMeF4CTYYegAA5A6TYSjE)

And here are my predictions:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1
0 | Sweden | vs | England | 2
0 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

![steemflourish.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmYuwE59nBtKjnPUhd9x3XoLkVMeF4CTYYegAA5A6TYSjE)

# <center>The rules of the prediction are really simple</center>

• Write a post to select and give a certain score to the teams (if after 90mins of play, your scores are right, you will have a 3point and if your prediction is right for a team that won - that is just a point) 
Ensure your topic is - “The blocktrades World Cup|My selections for Quarter finals ”

• [Ensure you resteem this official post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

• Use these tags - “blocktradesworldcup” and “mypicks”

• Only a verified account with at least 40 reputation can participate 

• Be sure with your selections before posting  cos you won't be able to edit it. Goodluck!

# NB: Only those that have participated before are eligible to participate now! 


<center> **[Ensure you vote for @anomadsoul and @acidyo as witness @ocd-witness (42 on the rank file) via this](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)
[While the @blocktrades (13 on the rank file)](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)**</center>

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter Finals
body:
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)

The FIFA WorldCup Russia 2018 Round of 16 matches concluded and we are heading into Quarter Finals where only 8 remaining teams competing to make it to the top. I think I only got 4 points with my predictions for the Last 16 matches. In total, that makes my over all score into 30 points.

The @worldcup-russia posted the latest announcement about the [Quarter Finals Predictions](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) and we only have a day to submit our predictions for the 4 matches. The scoring for predictions is still the same from the rules applied to the Round of 16. For every predicted scores from the matches with the predicted winning team or ties, a player gets 3 points and 1 point if otherwise and only predicted the winning team. 

These are my predictions for the Quarter Finals:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 2
2 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

Goodluck with your predictions!

You can submit your entry until July 4th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest!

*Thumbnail credited to @worldcup-russia*

author: travelling-two
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
https://s8.postimg.cc/httk9hahh/football-3344911_960_720.png

**[Source](https://busy.org/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)**

Hello Steemian Friends,

How are you all?

The FIFA World Cup 2018 in Russia is heating up with a couple of surprises and scares in the Round of 16. Notably, the 2010 World Cup champions were knocked out by the host nation, Russia. Belgium had to leave it to the last minute to win against Japan after going 2-0 down! Messi and Ronaldo demonstrated that football is a team game and even the best players in the world cannot win the World Cup with their nations alone!

**@worldcup-russia**, **@blocktrades**, **@anomadsoul** & **@acidyo** have announced that the **[Quarterfinal stage submissions for their contest is live](https://busy.org/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)** and everyone has around 2 days (a little more) to get their predictions in, so here we are getting ours!

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2 1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2 0 | Sweden | vs | England | 1 1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 0

There were some difficult games there to predict and hopefully our predictions will be right as we would love to see these teams in the semis. Yes, we didn't go for a draw which happened to three teams in the last round and they ended up going to penalties. We shall see what will happen! Get your selections in.

As always,

Stay Classy Steemians!

--- *Thank you for taking the time to read our post. If you really like our content, please follow us as we post regularly with different topics from Monday to Friday (with some exceptions at the weekends). How about your followers? Would they like this post? If so, please resteem it! Finally, if you are generous, please give us an Upvote! We thank you in advance! Lots of love / **@travelling-two***

body:
The last 16 stage finished and now waiting the matches for the round of Quarter Finals.
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ak6pbay6u5.jpg)
6 Countries Eliminated in Round of 16 World Cup 2018. Unfortunately, but that's the name of the game. Russia is able to create history by qualifying for the quarterfinals world cup 2018. Wowww so happy.

6 countries that were eliminated among others: Argentina, Spanish, Portugal, Denmark, Japan and Mexico.

The most exciting and fierce quarter final match is expected to take place in Kazan.

Maybe Brazil will definitely get away after dropping Mexico. then Belgium has to do an epic comeback to get rid of Asia's only representative in the fall phase. This is really fun .

#
With England safely through, here are my selections below. The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Sweden | vs | England | 2 1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 3
*Here is the original post with the full template to use. https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool* *Here below are some rules, copied from the above article.* RULES 1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals 2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement. 3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry. 4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks" 5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind. 6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start. 7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS. 8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here Scoring You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point. If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND. Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin! You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness

Now that the round of 16 is over, a new round of the [Blocktrades World Cup is starting](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).
In the round of 16 I guessed the winner of 5 out of 8 matches correctly. I also scored some points for having the score (partly) right, so I'm curious whether I gained some ground on the leaders in the overall standings.

Now it's time to give my prediction for the quarter finals:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
3 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 1
1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc9YKRK9wNg5K9FTkSRjZK5M5naEE9rcwopQ4gY7EXvHv/image.png)

author: jassennessaj
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
## Hello Steemians!
#
<center>https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png</center>
#
I have a disappointing predictions from the group and knockout stage. To be frank, this world cup has been the most unpredictable and weird World Cup I've seen. The favorite teams were knocked out and surprises keep coming!

So yes, I will try to have my luck on the quarter finals to add more excitement in my FIFA World Cup journey. I found this post announcement via @maverickinvictus. If you wish to be redirected for the contest, feel free to click this **[Link](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)**.
#
## So here are my Predictions :
#
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
2 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
3 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 2
1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2
#
## What do you think?
#
What do you think of these predictions? To be honest, I am not confident anymore haha. Given the fact that **Argentina** and **Spain** were out of the World Cup which were my choice.

Special thanks to @blocktrades for sponsoring this kind of contest. I totally appreciate the sponsorship of this amazing initiative. Have a wonderful day! 

Also to @acidyo and @anomadsoul for bringing this hyperactive type of contest. Surely, you will be blessed :)

body:

Until now I am not tooo bad in the score with 21 points after the group stage (I think number one had 31) and another 8 points during the last round. 

I didn't pick all the correct winners, but 2 times the right score 2 Uruguay - Portugal 1 and 1 Colombia - England 1, and I guessed, that Belgium and Sweden would win ;)

## So, here we go again! The world cup goes on today and these are my predictions for this last 8.


Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 3
1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2
0 | Sweden | vs | England |2
0 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2

Either way since Germany already got out of the cup, it would be cool to see somebody from Germany winning this price. @jaki01 is still the first of us in the list I think.

If you also want to join this game or want to know what it's all about click [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). Make sure to post before 06.07.2018, at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 !!!.

Good luck everyone! - Especially to Uruguay & Belgium ;)

And a huge thank you to @anomadsoul, @acidyo, and @blocktrades for providing this community with some much needed fun!

Greetings from Corfu, Greece!!

6 Countries Eliminated in Round of 16 World Cup 2018. Unfortunately, but that's the name of the game. Russia is able to create history by qualifying for the quarterfinals world cup 2018. Wowww so happy.

6 countries that were eliminated among others: Argentina, Spanish, Portugal, Denmark, Japan and Mexico.

The most exciting and fierce quarter final match is expected to take place in Kazan.

Maybe Brazil will definitely get away after dropping Mexico. then Belgium has to do an epic comeback to get rid of Asia's only representative in the fall phase. This is really fun .

author: marco-asensio
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
The last 16 stage finished and now waiting the matches for the round of Quarter Finals.
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ak6pbay6u5.jpg)
6 Countries Eliminated in Round of 16 World Cup 2018. Unfortunately, but that's the name of the game. Russia is able to create history by qualifying for the quarterfinals world cup 2018. Wowww so happy.

6 countries that were eliminated among others: Argentina, Spanish, Portugal, Denmark, Japan and Mexico.

The most exciting and fierce quarter final match is expected to take place in Kazan.

Maybe Brazil will definitely get away after dropping Mexico. then Belgium has to do an epic comeback to get rid of Asia's only representative in the fall phase. This is really fun .

Already we that know @blocktrades really like to sponsor events that involve the community. And also @anomadsoul & @acidyo know much Steemians likes this game.

It's a really big contest prize .. if you want to get involved. You can visit this link:
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

Here are my predictions:
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 3
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 1
1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

HeyHo let´s go!

If you want to participate read the Rules: 

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals

2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here 

... and click here https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool 

GOOD LUCK and Happy Football!

author: mushthafakamal
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter Finals
body:
Knockout stage is finished, now enter the quarter final. Where 8 teams will attack each other. As usual in the previous Russian world cup contest by @blocktrades, on the knockout stage I failed to guess the exact score of 8 matches, but I managed to guess 6 teams as winners.

6 teams that managed to go are France, Russia, Croatia, Brazil, Belgium, and England. For Uruguay and Sweden, I failed to predict as a winner.

As for this time, I re-participate for the quarter finals which will begin tomorrow night. Here are my predictions:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 1
0 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Sweden | vs | England |2
3 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | Uruguay | vs | France | 3 3 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 1 | Sweden | vs | England | 2 3 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2 > RULES > 1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals > 2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement. > 3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry. > 4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks" > 5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind. > 6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start. > 7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS. > 8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone,  > Scoring > You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

author: xiow-loch
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
The last 16 stage finished and now waiting the matches for the round of Quarter Finals.
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ak6pbay6u5.jpg)
6 Countries Eliminated in Round of 16 World Cup 2018. Unfortunately, but that's the name of the game. Russia is able to create history by qualifying for the quarterfinals world cup 2018. Wowww so happy.

6 countries that were eliminated among others: Argentina, Spanish, Portugal, Denmark, Japan and Mexico.

The most exciting and fierce quarter final match is expected to take place in Kazan.

Maybe Brazil will definitely get away after dropping Mexico. then Belgium has to do an epic comeback to get rid of Asia's only representative in the fall phase. This is really fun .

Already we that know @blocktrades really like to sponsor events that involve the community. And also @anomadsoul & @acidyo know much Steemians likes this game.

It's a really big contest prize .. if you want to get involved. You can visit this link:
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

author: andrewade
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
![New Composition_2018-06-04 15-01-09.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmS8Ujy91xzDMjDtDvBbWaPCFbUKDMJyxQ9u94XvzJ77hE/New%20Composition_2018-06-04%2015-01-09.jpg)

The round 16 of the 2018 world cup is now over with only 8 teams remaining in the competition. Judging from my experience of watching football for so many years, I have to conclude that the 2018 world cup has been one of the most competitive and unpredictable series of its kind. 

At this point in time, it has gotten to the point where each teams wouldn't just rely on quality alone, but would need luck along with hard-work. Dew to these factors, it's now so difficult predicting the outcomes of these matches.

I was unable to get a correct score prediction for the round of 16 matches. Although I was able to get most of the final outcomes right, but at this point where a correct score fetches you a sounding 3 sure points, you wouldn't wanna get the outcome alone but you surely would long to see your predicted scores displayed after the final whistle of each match.

The next round will commence in two days time with Uruguay and France starting the show, while Brazil and Belgium will begin theirs later in the day. I'm participating in the quarter final round of the @blocktrade world cup, and below are my predictions for the four matches to be played.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 1
1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 1
1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

If you're interested in participating, then visit the below link for more information:

https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

Thanks to @acidyo, @blocktrades, and @anomadsoul for making this contest.

author: autinf
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
# The @blocktrades World Cup: My selections for the Quarter finals
Hi dear ones, this is my entry to the contest in the celebration of the football world cup Russia 2018, in its third part (the Quarter finals). Sponsored by @blocktrades and supported by friends @acidyo and @anomadsoul.
https://radio-corporacion.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/maxresdefault-1-678x381.jpg [Source](https://radio-corporacion.com/blog/archivos/23670/cancion-del-mundial-la-fifa-2018/)
Before my entry, I leave you some important links: - [Here the link to the official publication of the contest, Quarter finals](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) made by @worldcup-russia, where you will find the rules you must follow. - [Here the link](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) so you can vote as a witness to @blocktrades and @ocd-witness. It's optional, but I recommend it, since these guys do a good job of supporting the platform. Without further ado my selections here:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2 3 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2 1 | Sweden | vs | England |1 0 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 3
Thanks again @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul. Greetings to all, blessings and a big hug. --- *** #### Recommended Communities: |

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals.
body:
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdsz2WADx52WrSjZXfgtTbQ8pHoHh92qUnFePq1KhviPb/image.png)
[](https://pixabay.com/it/viertelelfinale-3515351/)
Dear readers, the King event is still going on, I am talking about the World Cup, where there are only the best 8 teams of this edition, Russia 2018. There have been many surprises, because nobody expected to be fired so fast by two players that for many they are the best of the world of football, I speak of Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo, they say goodbye to contention and I get their respective selections, Argentina and Portugal. Also the farewell of great teams predicted to reach further this world as Germany and Spain. A world totally different from the others, many goals and also autogoles, many penalties, also many unexpected results, but this is how it is this party, the round ball and any event worth taking place.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc8J82mK9spey5WB6BSJcgBB8Sk7Q2HH4tUBJ95VBjFNc/image.png)
[Source.](https://talksport.com/football/373172/world-cup-2018-fixtures-results-games/)
In spite of the great events and surprises of this World Cup, we continue to celebrate with emotions to the maximum, a prediction contest will be organized for the next instance, I am talking about the quarterfinals, where @blocktrades will be the sponsor and @acidyo & @anomadsoul know a lot of Steemians love this game, so they decided to organize this great event.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTVajxyhbMbZFjQ6m2dzU7QeGDunQ2zcA3bARNyc5GvAM/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)
It is very easy to continue participating in this contest, you just have to make a publication selecting each winner of the next 4 games. You must include the score you think will happen in these 4 games and the score should be considered when the 90 minutes end, which will allow predictions in a draw.
Here I share my predictions for the quarterfinals.

As a contest without rules is not a contest, then here are the rules for you to know them and start participating.
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6FR82htkcpwuEZphRSdrBWaFWEbi13Cmon1cscrKqLG/image.png)
[Source.](https://prnt.sc/iu376a)

Rules:

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals.

2 - In your publication, you must include a link to this announcement made by @worldcup-russia, you can see it here.

3 - Use the format included in the link above so we can organize each entry.

4 - Use the tags #blocktradesworldcup and the tag #mypicks.

5 - Resteem the publication of the announcement of this challenge, enter here to see it.

6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining.

8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here.

Scoring

You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.
Hello, if you only saw this and do not join the group stage and neither in the round of 16, do not worry, there is good news for you, you can still join the elimination stage, just keep in mind that other people who are joined from the beginning and they will have an advantage over you.
This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness here.

This is an organized contest @acidyo & @anomadsoul, if you like what they are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness here.

||| |-|-| |

author: elshadr
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
####
Passing the group phase and knockdown phase with grief stories, finally the eight best teams from around the world ensure themselves to play in the FIFA Worldcup Russia 2018 Quarter Finals, here are my predictions for four matches in the quarter-finals

author: jmetroya
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
Good evening friends, every time we are closer to know who will be the new world champion, in this world cup we will have good quarter-final crosses, although one side of the picture looks stronger than the other. If you want to participate or know about the contest and its rules, here is the Link https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png

Image source

In the last round I did well, I hope to continue on the same line to shorten the difference. France Vs Uruguay a clash of titans that I look forward to and which I will not be able to see due to work commitments, I hope the Uruguayans will pass, but for that they will have to annul the star of France, one Kylian Mbappe, who starts to build his history as the best player. In this same key we will have the game of Brazil Vs Belgica, another match where the team that best played in the cup (in my humble opinion) against the card under the sleeve of South America. Brazil is our Madrid in the champions, meets and wins, when we neglect to raise the cup. On Saturday we have less attractive clashes, but no less important, quarterfinals. A Russia Vs Croatia, the local faces against some Croats who go with everything, while in the other key is Sweden Vs England, some Swedes who want to be the rebellion of this cup, ranking above Italy, the Swedes want to prove that They came to make history and they did not come just for a walk.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 0 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 0 1 | Sweden | vs | England |2 1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2

This is my prediction for the quarterfinals, this world cup brought many surprises. it is already ending so it is a pity, but it was very different thanks to steemit this world cup.

I think we connected to many people and those who did not participate, they lost a special touch to the games, flirting because your team wins is a very good experience, but flirting to raise your position in the ranking is much better.

I felt that he was the one who scored the goals. I felt that he was the one who gave the passes and I got angry with the penalties against.

World cup of soccer is every 4 years and thanks to these initiatives we live in a very special and different way something to remember forever, tell our friends that we participate, do you remember where we are?

steemit is a platform of so many opportunities that ... you like football? you earn money...
Do you like art? you earn money...
you like to sing? you earn money...
you do not like money? you earn money ...

the end of our tastes should not be the remuneration of money but nobody can complain about receiving an incentive for demonstrating your talent.

body:

We are nearing the finals.  Just a few more games to see who can make it.

If you have not been joining this contest, you are still free to join.  Don't be left behind.  It's easy.  Just make your post and guess what would be the score (based on the the regular time of 90 minutes) and who the winner is.

This is my entry:

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
0 | Uruguay | vs | France | 1
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 1
1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 0

![1.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbVurf66Jp2PebfVkBaNuDLEhN31W6QiVjiURaUnziLjF)

If you don't know anything about the game, that's okay.  You can still join.  If you are not a fan, that's alright.  Just make a guess you think would win.

For more details, you can check out this post https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool

In this post, you will know more about the rules for this contest.

Here are the rules for your benefit:

>RULES

>1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals

>2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.

>3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.

>4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"

>5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.

>6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

>7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.

>8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here

>Scoring
>You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

>If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND.

>Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin!

>You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

I have to be honest, I am not doing well on my entries so far but what heck!  It is a fun thing to do lol!

Thanks to @blocktrades @anomadsoul and @acidyo for this contest.

author: livinguktaiwan
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals // The World Cup is killing me 世界盃要了我的命
body:
http://livinguktaiwan.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/PSX_20180704_163555-1.jpg

Literally!  All these late night (actually early morning to be precise) 2am matches are really taking the toll on me in the past week.  Luckily there's only two more weekends to go, so life will go back to normal soon. 連續幾晚凌晨兩點熬夜看賽事，實在要了我的命! 幸好只剩下兩個週末的賽事，很快就會回復正常生活。

I'm not actually a football fan. I don't watch the FA cup or Premier League, and didn't watch most of the world cup knockout stage matches.  The only matches I really watched were the two that England played.  In fact I watched the England vs Panama match in a bar in Taiwan, a rarity as football isn't popular in Taiwan.  Boy, that was a great match, but then we were playing Panama who were 43 places below us on the FIFA ranking.  Nevertheless, a win is win , especially when you win 6-1.  That was definitely a much needed boost of confidence for us. 其實我並不是足球迷，之前分組賽也只是看了英格蘭的兩場賽事。 其中一場對巴拿馬，我到台灣的酒吧看。足球在台灣不太流行，能夠像英國到酒吧看球賽十分開心，而且還大勝6比1，實在為英格蘭國家隊打了一支強心針。

Two nights ago I watched Belgium vs Japan, not that I had planned to, but Japan were playing really well, and before I knew it I had sat through the entire game.   By the time I went to bed it was 4am.  The next morning I woke up at 11am, missing my normal yoga lesson.  See how the World Cup messes up my life!!! 兩晚前原本沒打算看比利時對日本。但日本隊表現出色結果不知不覺看完整場賽事。上床時已是凌晨4點，第二天早11點才起床，還錯過了瑜伽課。你看世界盃多麻煩噢！ England was due to play Colombia yesterday, kick off at 2am my time.   I had planned to watch that despite the previous late night.  What does sleeping a few hours less matter when you're supporting your home team.  By around 3.30am things were looking pretty much settled.  England was leading by a goal and there were just a few minutes of the game left. I was ready to go to bed.  A few minutes later, the worse thing happened, Colombia scored a last minute equalizer!  Oh no!  That would be at least another half an hour before I could go to bed.  Half an hour went by and still no sign of a goal.  It was looking more like a penalty shoot out which meant another 10 minutes or so.  On top of that, hubby tells me that we've never won on penalty shootouts before.  Shit. 昨晚英格蘭對哥倫比亞凌晨2點開賽，這場一定要看。 3點半時英國仍領先一球，賽果似乎已成定局，我正準備上床睡覺。誰不知幾分鐘後，慘痛的情況出現! 我至少要再熬夜多半小時，結果原來半小時還不夠，還要多加10分鐘來個互射12碼/PK大戰分勝負。 更慘的是，老公說英格蘭在這方面從未贏過。 Well, there's always a first for everything, and everything was worth it in the end.  As I went to bed at 5am, I noticed dawn was about to break outside.  This is such a beautiful world. 世上所有事情都總有第一次。總算沒有白費我在熬夜。 到5點上床時，發覺窗外已晨光初現。 原來世界是這樣美。

I'm not going to jinx things now, but there's always a first for everything.  If we can do it once, we can do it again.  Bring on the next game. 能夠第一次打破魔咒，那必定可以再來一次。噢，都是不要說好，說出來可能不吉利。 --- That aside, I will still make my predictions for the last quarter finals for the Blocktrades Worldcup, [you can find the link here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 0 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2 1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 0 | Sweden | vs | England |1 2 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 0
Posted from my blog with SteemPress : http://livinguktaiwan.com/the-world-cup-is-killing-me-%e4%b8%96%e7%95%8c%e7%9b%83%e8%a6%81%e4%ba%86%e6%88%91%e7%9a%84%e5%91%bd/

author: maikelblogo
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals (by maikelblogo)
body:
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc8J82mK9spey5WB6BSJcgBB8Sk7Q2HH4tUBJ95VBjFNc/blob)

What a dramatic game between Colombia and England!!! And how stupid were the two colombians shooters to move the baloon out the field like baseball it was!!!

    Anyway, i still competing in this fantasy contest now we are on Quarter Finals, and no matter how much have lost in this competition, i like this idea made by @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul.

      Last part of this competition i won 6 of the 8 matches, Mexico and Switzerland were responsible of that losing. But not all the time will be victories and winners of huge prizes are just exceptional cases.

        Nevermind, once again i will put my picks for this game, this time, for the Quarter Final...
          Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | Uruguay | vs | France |4 3| Brazil | vs | Belgium |2 1 | Sweden | vs | England |3 2| Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

            All my wishes for the victory of all teams. For the final match, i can predict the the cup between England and France. This last team has more probabilities for being the champion than England. But nobody will know it after Semi-Final matches...

#
Russia World Cup 2018
### Saleum.. The last 16 of Russia's 2018 World Cup finals have ended, leaving only 8 national teams in the 2018 World Cup crown for Russia. Below is the result of the 16th round match of the 2018 World Cup Russia. >Pertandingan babak 16 besar piala dunia 2018 Russia telah usai, sekarang hanya menyisakan 8 tim Nasional pada helatan piala dunia 2018 Rusia. Dibawah ini adalah hasil pertandingan babak 16 besar Piala Dunia 2018 Rusia. ![6m26ag2msd.png](https://img.esteem.ws/6m26ag2msd.png)
![8awyvyvzdm.png](https://img.esteem.ws/8awyvyvzdm.png)
![6m26ag2msd.png](https://img.esteem.ws/6m26ag2msd.png) Next will enter the quarter-final round match which will take place on 06 July 2018 local time. In this round, Uruguay national team will face the France national team. >Selajutnya akan memasuki pertandingan babak perempat final yang akan berlangsung pada tanggal 06 July 2018 waktu setempat. Pada babak ini, timnas Uruguay akan menghadapi timnas Perancis. This is my prediction of the 2018 World Cup quarter-finals of Russia. >Inilah prediksa saya babak perempat final piala dunia 2018 Rusia.
![6m26ag2msd.png](https://img.esteem.ws/6m26ag2msd.png)

author: pacokam8
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
The last 16 stage finished a few minutes ago and we already know the matches for the round of Quarter finals https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png As you already know, @blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event. We have more than 1,800 valid entries and the competition is very close, no one is far ahead and everyone can still win, especially considering that for the knockout stage we will consider the correct score so people can earn more points per match. To keep participating, you have to make a post picking each winner of the next 4 games. You have to include the score you think will happen on these 4 games in Regual time (only the first 90 minutes): Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 3 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 0 | Sweden | vs | England |1 0 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2

Scoring

You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point. If you didn´t join for the group stage and knockout stage you CAN'T JOIN FOR THIS ROUND. Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin! You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness here This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness here

author: rothberg
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
Would you imagine the quarterfinals would be without Germany or Spain or even Argentina? That’s the beauty about this game. Passion, heart and determination can defeat experience and past success. 

So far the best game I’ve watched in this World Cup is Belgium vs Japan. There were more amazing games, but this one is the most memorable for me. 

Can’t wait to see what surprises has next round for us!

author: sirtorito
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
![images(6).jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdgbR26UyygStk61Y1TJFFpWcHyoQCpkcE5NXiQgQgYHm/images(6).jpg)
The third stage of the World Cup (Russia-2018) has already started and here it is in the bloctrades country, bringing us the next phase. If you already participated in the first and second, what are you waiting for! and if you have not done anything to compete in this third phase [Enter Here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
___ Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 00 | Uruguay | vs | France | 02 01 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 03 01 | Sweden | vs | England | 00 01 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 02 ___ ___ ###
RULES
___
1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.
3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.
4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"
5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.
6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.
7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining and we will be checking that the winners ARE ACTIVE AND REAL STEEMIANS.
8 - You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone. If you don´t know that time zone, check it here ###
Scoring
###
You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.

# The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals

-------------

Well, well, well... That went *not so good*. [Sweden - Switzerland? 0-1 I said](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@soyrosa/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections-for-the-last-16). What did it turn out to be? 1-0. That kind of thing. The teams get better, the scores closer to each other, the differences smaller. Will there be ties at 90 minutes? I don't know. I just gamble and say 'no'. Here is what the teams will do... I hope.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
0 | Uruguay | vs | France | 1
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1
0 | Sweden | vs | England | 2
0 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

# Want to join in the fun?

-------------

- First things first: you can join even if you didn't for the first rounds! Of course there will be a disadvantage since you're missing points from the first rounds, but don't let it keep you from joining!
- Here you can find the [announcement post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) - Share your own guesses! 

-------

### *Thanks to all the cool guys organizing this, @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul, crating content is what I'm here for, but playing a few community games once in a while is really fun (and important) too!*

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body: Hello everyone! Elías and I are still competing in [this World Cup](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes), and we are really excited about it. You can't imagine how happy we were when we found out we had passed to [the knockout stage](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). Love you, bro, the best luck of all to you. author: betza
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
![rusia 2018.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/rusia%202018.png)
Este ha sido un mundial de sorpresas para muchos, pues las selecciones favoritas han quedado fuera, pero la emoción al ver cada partido continúa, y para estos cuartos de final mis predicciones son:
>This has been a world of surprises for many, because the favorite selections have been left out, but the excitement to see each game continues, and for these quarterfinals my predictions are:

author: caturrox
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter Finals
body:
##
The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter Finals
*** Hola amigos steemianos, el dia de hoy les traigo la entrega a la tercera fase del concurso realizado por @anomadsoul, @acidyo y @blocktrades. Ya se lleva haciendo el sorteo por partes desde el inicio del mundial de rusia 2018, y la verdad que ha estado bastante interesante. No me ha ido muy bien que digamos durante los resultados de los partidos, pero si que han estado bastante entretenidos. Espero en esta ocasion poder acertar a los resultados y ganarme algo porlomenos jajaja.
![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeLEuvgXwPJSVtxbMZDkKCRpbHakwnR3kzpzzY6C1myQp) [Fuente](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/the-knockout-stage-is-on-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

Mis predicciones para la fase de cuartos de finales son las siguientes.
Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2 1 | Sweden | vs | England | 2 1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2
Si quieres saber mas acerca de este sorteo, las reglas y las instrucciones para participar debes dirigirte a [este post.](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) La verdad que si son partidos muy complicados, son unos excelentes partidos por los que por ningun motivo me los perdere. Espero poder ganar el sorteo y por sobre todo disfrutar de este deporte tan lindo que es el futbol. Saludos a todos.

author: cradle
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
#
IT'S QUARTERFINALS
![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png) --- ***
At last the elimination has come to an end, and we football aficionados really enjoyed the group and knockout stage, where my decision gave me a poor prediction and its a quite disappointing knowing that powerhouse team was already knocked out and eliminated, Now i do believe that none of the teams is a powerhouse team, instead world cup is all about teamworks and that what makes this year world cup really exciting from the group and knockout stage and now to the quarterfinals.
*** ***
To test my predictions accurately I preferred to think it thrice not to try to have my luck on the quarter finals as more excitement and surprises awaits us in our journey in FIFA World Cup.
*** ***
I do found this post announcement via [@jassennessaj](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@jassennessaj/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections-for-the-quarter-finals), For more queries, comments and questions regarding to this contest please feel free to [click this link](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).
*** #
My Predictions!
| | | | | | -|-|-|-|- Score | Team | vs | Team | Score 1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 2 | Sweden | vs | England | 1 2 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2 ***
Special thanks to @blocktrades for sponsoring this kind of contest. I totally appreciate the sponsorship of this amazing initiative. Have a wonderful day!
*** ***
Also to @acidyo and @anomadsoul for bringing this hyperactive type of contest. Surely, god bless you all guys :)
***

author: emma001
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
***
<center>**The Round of 16 is over, it came with a lot action and surprises. Now will must move ahead, the quarter final awaits**</center>
***
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/dfongbbr7x.jpg)
***

author: hanshotfirst
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals (and a little about the movie Victory)
body:
Normally I only like to post a couple of times each week. I usually aim for Wednesday and Saturday. Although I am going to stick to the two times this week, I have had to adjust the days I am posting. You see, this is a special occasion. I don't only mean the World Cup. More importantly, this special occasion has brought together over 1800 steemians! Of course I am talking about.... # [The Blocktrades World Cup contest!!!!!!](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)
Although I have absolutely no idea what I am doing, I am having fun! That is what this is all about. [This contest](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) has given me reasons to watch some of the games. Thank you to @anomadsoul & @acidyo for putting it together! Before I ramble too much, here are my picks: Score | Team | vs | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | Uruguay | vs | France | 0 2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 1 0 | Sweden | vs | England |3 1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2
Now that I have my losing picks out of the way, how about a mini movie review?
![Screen Shot 2018-07-05 at 11.57.28 PM.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYbZA369TbNcsCYpqL7XLvySsKSoLAGkBcQotWGrBJKig/Screen%20Shot%202018-07-05%20at%2011.57.28%20PM.png)

As an American child of the 70s, I am not a big soccer guy. In fact until very recently, like most Americans my age, the only famous soccer player I could name was the great Pele. This got me thinking about one of my absolute favorite movies that I used to watch as a kid: *Victory*. I used to rent that movie at least 3 times a year (on BETA) when I was a kid. I absolutely loved it! Yesterday, I realized I was going to have to write another post including my soccer picks. Considering I seem to be allergic to posting anything under 600 words, I knew I had to add something to spice up my pick post. My mind immediately wandered to *Victory*. Because I have fallen prey to the phenomenon of my memory believing something was better than it actually was, I decided to buy an instant download of *Victory* from Amazon. Then I *told* my 13 year old son we were going to watch one of my favorite movies from when I was his age. I sat him down and pressed "play". I have to admit I was nervous. On more than one occasion, my memory has failed me. Something I loved as a child turned out to be absolutely horrendous (for example *Battle Beyond the Stars*). However, as soon as the movie began, I was filled with confidence that my son and I were about to enjoy the next two hours of our lives. Because I fell in love with this movie when I was 12, I honestly cannot tell you if it is a good movie or not. What I can say is that I love it as much now as I did 35 years ago (perhaps more). When I first watched *Victory* I had no idea who the director was... and I didn't care. Budding action star Sylvester Stallone played the lead and it was about POWs escaping from a German prison camp during WWII. That is really all I needed to know. Throw in some sports and I was over the moon.
https://cdn1us.denofgeek.com/sites/denofgeekus/files/styles/main_wide/public/escape-to-victory_main.jpg?itok=eXCCXRJR

But yesterday I discovered that the director was actually John freaking Huston! The same Oscar winning guy who directed *The Maltese Falcon* and *The African Queen*. What? I had remembered the movie as pure nonsense, not an actual high quality film. Here is what I remembered. By 1981, I had already seen *The Longest Yard* and *The Great Escape* at least 20 times each. *Victory* was a combination of the two. For 13 year old me, that was pure heaven! Before I go any further, let me just state that I 100% understand that the premise of the movie is completely ludicrous. A Nazi officer, played by...
### Max von Sydow!!!!
discovers that a member of England's World Cup soccer team is imprisoned in a POW camp he visits. Sydow's character, who was a former player himself, decides to set up a game between the POWs and Germany. At first glance, this is ridiculous. However, there were some historical cases of POWs playing against German soldiers. After the game is set, the movie becomes the delightful combination of *The Great Escape* and *The Longest Yard* I mentioned earlier. Because I hate spoilers, I won't say anything else about the movie except for the fact that all of the players on both teams were actual international soccer stars from the 1970s. The biggest of these stars was the great Pele himself. Not only does he play an important role in the movie, he also choreographed all of the soccer scenes (and there are many) that included some of the soccer stars' signature trick moves.
https://www.bfi.org.uk/sites/bfi.org.uk/files/styles/full/public/image/victory-1981-001-pele-football-pitch-00m-jn0.jpg?itok=bkM6GLBu

Without ruining anything, I can tel you that at several points, I paused the movie to discuss the topics of: honor, sacrifice, and courage with my son. In addition, there is a tear-jerker scene that reminds us that under Hitler's reign, people from Poland and Czechoslovakia were not considered worthy of being treated with the respect of a prisoner of war. This scene inspired me to discuss the fact that there are administrations today that do not feel that all people should be treated with dignity and respect. Although I still loved watching *Victory* yesterday, I realize that I am biased by childhood nostalgia. I would be curious to hear from someone who watched it for the first time as an adult. Is *Victory* a good movie? *Images* [1](https://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51RmIk3UgAL.jpg), [2](https://cdn1us.denofgeek.com/sites/denofgeekus/files/styles/main_wide/public/escape-to-victory_main.jpg?itok=eXCCXRJR), [3](https://www.bfi.org.uk/sites/bfi.org.uk/files/styles/full/public/image/victory-1981-001-pele-football-pitch-00m-jn0.jpg?itok=bkM6GLBu)

author: hrissm
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
# floppy bitchmar jr pt2
#
![301BB7B3-3516-4B1C-A6A2-AA9CC9225D8B.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVEfUmkRFzRxf8iEXtgkEF13MHew27wMQbAed81777rkn/301BB7B3-3516-4B1C-A6A2-AA9CC9225D8B.jpeg)
___

So far it’s been an interesting and unpredictable  tournament. With Germany not even making it past the group stages and Spain, Argentina, Portugal gone after the first knockout round. Not to mention countries like Italy, Holland and Chile who did not even qualify (nor did Ellas, the 2004 European champions). Some unlucky breaks for teams that played well, in the likes of Senegal and Serbia for not making it out of the group stage and Japan losing in the dying minutes to Belgium in the round of sixteen. There were also some great performances put in by low ranked teams flying under the radar like Iran, Morocco, Tunisia, and Iceland against more difficult opponents. 
___

![5C09825B-9277-4A16-B131-39C337A67494.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVgLDRxAjMdMp1qu5wJqoRkNNsRUCJ9BBfvs22GY9sBCR/5C09825B-9277-4A16-B131-39C337A67494.jpeg)

title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/jhjw8xooxl.jpg)

The round of 16 of the Russia 2016 World Cup is over. With lots of moments to remember; Spain, Argentina and Portugal who were tagged favourites prior to the competition have been eliminated in this round. 
Lots of breath taking games have been recorded especially with Belgium coming from 2 goals down to win at the last minute. The number of games that were decided on penalties was also a surprise to me because I expected more straight forward victories.

Well,  the quarter finals are hear, and I am making my entry for this stage of the tournament courtesy of @Blocktrades, @acidyo, @anomadsoul.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
3 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 0

author: lemmybe
title: The blocktrades World Cup|My selections for Quarter finals
body:
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ietan4vw2i.jpg)
*********
### The round of 16 has come and gone. 
Yet again, we experienced another round of exhilarating encounters between teams of 16 different countries and indeed it was an epic battle that separated the men from the boys. Virtually all the teams put up a good fight but the fight wasn't enough in the end while they succumbed into the cold hands of defeat. 

The last round of sixteen was an exposition into life itself. it reminded of the timeless saying that *The race is indeed not for the swift*. Despite mexico having a good run into the competition, they got humbled by Brazil whom everyone thought they (Mexico) would perform another "german wonder". However, it is what it is; the game of football. 

### So...
As a continuation to my entries for the World Cup contest organized by @anomadsoul and @acidyo and sponsored by @blocktrades. These are my submissions for the next round.

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 0
1 | Sweden | vs | England | 2
1 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2

**<center>Note: This is only for those that have participated in previous predictions</center>**
### <center>The rules</center> 

> Write a post to select and give a certain score to the teams (if after 90mins of play, your scores are right, you will have a 3point and if your prediction is right for a team that won - that is just a point)

> Ensure your topic is - “The blocktrades World Cup|My selections for Quarter finals ”

> Ensure you resteem this [official post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

> Use these tags - “blocktradesworldcup” and “mypicks”

> Only a verified account with at least 40 reputation can participate

> Be sure with your selections before posting cos you won't be able to edit it. Goodluck!

### <center>Scoring</center>
**<center>You have to include the score for these predictions. For each correct score you will get three (3) points. If you only get right who won but you didn´t get the correct score, you will be awarded one (1) point.</center>**

### I wish you all the good luck in this stage.

Picture [Source](Indian express.com)

You can submit your entry until July 6th 2018 at 16:59 pm, UTC+3 Time zone.

RULES

1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktradesWorld Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement.
3 - Use the format included on this post to make your predictions so we can organize each entry.
4 - Use the tags "blocktradesworldcup" and the tag "mypicks"
5 - Resteem this post. We need everyone to see this post so no one stays behind.
6 - You can't edit your post after the first match of this stage start.

author: rolsonpatison
title: @bloctrades World Cup | My selections for the quarter finals
body:
#### Hello 

This World cup is amazing. Great match between Spain and Portugal,  amazing pursuit Columbia from 0-2 to 3-2. Nervous moments, nice goals and new VAR system. And this is Just the begining! 

But... i am from Poland. After Quarter finals during Euro 2016, we wanted next success.. People in Poland supported our national team in fan zones. 

![45D0132B-0989-4F72-A7A5-76B94E09F32B.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRUcE6DYLgefyVCAsUyJSnR8HKQZeYgTbkibmYzinj2kF/45D0132B-0989-4F72-A7A5-76B94E09F32B.jpeg)

We believed in success and we hung white and red flags on houses, cars and everywhere. And...we lose with Senegal, because of terrible mistakes our Goalkeeper and defensive line. Columbia was much better. We won only one math with Japan and go home...

Look in wiki, who was on 3rd place in the World in 1974 and 1982 :)

And here are my picks

0| Russia | vs | Croatia | 3

author: symonp
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
<center> ![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)
[*Image Source*](https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png)</center>
---

My predictions in the Round of 16 was extremely terrible,  almost all of the selections were wrong. But that is football, you will never knew what surprise is waiting for you. The team that I expect to win the Worldcup is Germany were eliminated in the Group Stage and after that, my guess was Argentina and Spain but they were also eliminated in the Round of 16 by France and Russia respectively. But luckily, I bet on France and Russia to win because I wanted to bet on the underdog for the Round of 16. Through the Round of 16 and the Group Stage, football shows that "Being the underdog doesn't mean being a loser". You can beat the best team in the world if you believe and work hard for it. This time, I analyzed every match in the Quarter Finals and hopefully, all of my predictions will come true, I hope England will win Sweden through penalty shootout.

This contest is sponsored by @blocktrades and organized by @acidyo & @anomadsoul. If you want to know more about this amazing contest, please click here: [The @blocktrades World Cup - Round of Quarterfinals](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool).

<center> 
## Here are my picks for the Quarter finals of the FIFA World Cup 2018 
</center>

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 3
1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2

author: the-alien
title: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections for the Quarter finals
body:
![Alt Text](https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/grm-assets/19286/1jjfcyxskqc9x5cuqnfunka.jpeg)

This world cup has been undoubtedly one of the most surprising editions in a very long time. Unexpected results have became an everyday occurrence. 

So much so that you wonder if the bookies are crying or laughing.

Football is a sport where everything can happen, and it’s not surprising to see smaller teams exceeding expectations. For example, Sweden and Bulgaria in 1994, Croatia in 1998, Turkey in 2002… Etc.

But nothing at the scale we’re seeing right now. Which makes picking the results of the next round all the more difficult.

You’re stuck between adapting to this new momentum where the underdogs are constantly (and consistently) knocking out the favorites, or if the trend would reverse in the next round.

But the best thing is that it doesn’t matter. This is just a game and no one holds the crystal ball, so why not have some fun and take some wild guesses.

Without further ado, here are my picks for the [The @blocktrades World Cup  Quarter Finals:](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool)

Score | Team | vs | Team | Score
-|-|-|-|-
1 | Uruguay | vs | France | 2
2 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 2
1 | Sweden | vs | England |2
0 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 1

For anyone who is just catching up, make sure to check [this post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool) to participate in this cool steemit contest with 2000 SBD in prizes.

Many thanks to @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul for this awesome challenge!

### Good luck everybody!

author: warpedpoetic
title: @blocktrades World Cup | My Selection of The Quarter Finals
body:
The game has been a source of amazement and shock for a little of people according to the comments I have read in social mediums. Portugal and Argentina were not expected to live the competition this early as a result of the presence of the persons of Ronaldo and Messi in the team line ups of the aforementioned respective teams. Well things turned out differently. 

<center>![football-3344911_960_720.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/football-3344911_960_720.png)</center>

I believe that an underdog would take this World Cup home and I may be wrong but this is my own personal opinion and I know next to nothing about football so bear with me. 

Below are my selections for the quarter finals. To participate in the contest, you have to have participated in the previous two segments of the contest. You check the contest out [here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/quarter-finals-stage-submit-your-entry-to-keep-competing-for-the-2-000-sbd-prize-pool). See you on the other side. 
***

-|-|-|-|-

1 | Brazil | vs | Belgium | 3

3 | Russia | vs | Croatia | 2
***
Thanks to @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul for putting this game together. May the best country win.
